title: Apple's F1 gamble gets mixed response - What you missed at the US GP
summary: Cadillac's quiet confidence, Apple's broadcasting gamble and a few overlooked stories all shaped an eventful 2025 United States Grand Prix weekend

qa_pairs.question: Which team is associated with the 2025 United States Grand Prix alongside Apple's broadcasting initiatives?
In what year did the United States Grand Prix take place that featured a mix of broadcasting strategies and team performances?
What type of response did Apple's broadcasting gamble receive during the 2025 US GP weekend?
